elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the questions on the factual text "The 1st pillar - state pension provision".

elements.name: question1
elements.title: How is the AHV financed?
elements.correctAnswer: The AHV is financed via salary percentages, half by employees and half by employers. A portion is also contributed by alcohol and tobacco taxes as well as other tax revenues.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What is the EO?
elements.correctAnswer: The EO is the income compensation scheme. Thanks to it, all those performing military service receive salary compensation, which is financed from salary percentages. Recruits have a fixed rate and those who complete a refresher course receive up to 75 percent of their insured salary. The amount of salary compensation from the EO depends on whether someone has children or other persons to support.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Explain the mechanism of redistribution in the calculation of AHV pensions.
elements.correctAnswer: The wage differences between rich and poor are equalized through the calculation of AHV pensions.
